input_email_body:
Subject: Support for Reporting a Security Incident

Customer Support, preparing a report on a security incident involving hospital systems. An unauthorized access attempt was detected, posing a risk to the security of medical data. The incident might have occurred due to a misconfigured firewall or a phishing attack My name is David Kim.. Actions taken include updating passwords, reviewing access logs, and tightening firewall settings, but the issues persist You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Kindly request assistance in investigating and resolving the matter to ensure the security of medical data.
